item.title: We’ve Won a Major Victory in the Battle Against ‘De-Banking’
item.description: Chase’s decision to drop discrimination based on politics and religion is good for business.

item.title: Equalizing Medicare Payments: Will the Trump Administration Push Through?
item.description: Building on its previous efforts, the current Trump administration has the opportunity to implement a policy that balances cost savings with care.

item.title: Bruno Dumont Strikes Back Against Star Wars
item.description: The Empire is a manifesto opposing the most corrupt, childish film genre.
